pages.text: To get a maid is extremely special and needs to be done through the multi-blocks altar.$(br2)Since the craft table is likely to change later, please check it in the JEI altar label.

Once the maid is spawned, you will need a cake to tame it. the tamed items can be changed in the configuration file, which is not repeated here.$(br2)The tamed maid is almost identical to the vanilla pet, and you can right-click to open her GUI.
